question: How man course are there?
answer: We release and average of 10 courses per calendar year.

question: How can I cancel my plan?
answer: You can cancel your plan at anytime. Log into your account and scroll to the bottom of the first tab.

question: Can I down load the content?
answer: Yes, all the course and there content can be downloaded.

question: Do I get a certificate?
answer: Yes, at the completion of everycourse, you will be provided with a link to download your certificate.
